title: 好想罷工，但擔心有手尾跟嘅請入嚟，有辦法幫你全公司罷工- send email

replies.msg:
首先係度多謝幫手推上個post嘅手足，感激

我係一個廢中，養妻活兒，供樓供保險，唔可以冇咗份工

見到前線啲小朋友俾人打，俾人用槍射，好心痛，好想罷工嚟幫佢地，但又驚俾人秋後算帳。

其實只要大家肯匿名用Gmail send個email俾公司管理層，問佢哋星期一全港大罷工，點樣確保員工返工嘅安全。好可能就可以迫管理層宣佈星期一全部員工唔使返公司。咁大家就可以放心去集會。

只係send一個匿名嘅email，你嘅風險成本係零，但係就可以幫到前線辦手足唔使再出嚟俾人打。

請你幫下佢哋。將下邊個email send俾公司管理層。cc 大量同事，管理層就必須回應。

聽日星期五上晝一定要send出去，比管理層有下午時間回覆。

—————————-
Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5
https://www.asiatimes.com/2019/07/article/hk-protesters-call-for-citywide-strike-on-august-5

————-
希望可以做到
1）由你個email開始，要求管理層對罷工當日員工上班安全作出回應
2）公司自然就會主動叫唔使返工
3）就會有好多人唔使驚秋後算帳，可以出嚟集會
4）集會人數就好多
5）集會人多，之後嗰日公司都只能夠繼續叫員工繼續唔番

咁就搞成一個self fulfilling 嘅罷工，仲可以持續多日！
好似幾正 推

Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5
https://www.asiatimes.com/2019/07/article/hk-protesters-call-for-citywide-strike-on-august-5

11 小時前
所有人聽日同我打去2825 4668查詢自己喺唔喺陪審員名單！
之後跟以下指示做：


ROP18: https://www.immd.gov.hk/pdforms/rop18.pdf

雖然香港法律改革委員會曾經指出：
陪審員必須是香港居民，年齡介乎21至65歲之間，並無因失明、失聰或其他無行為能力的情況而使他不能出任陪審員，具有良好品格，以及「對在有關的法律程序進行時將予採用的語言所具有的知識，足以令他明白該等法律程序」。法例沒有說明如何衡量該項語言能力，但按照行政上的慣常做法，未達中七或同等教育程度的人向來被排除在陪審員人選之外。法例也沒有說明在確定陪審員人選時，「良好品格」和「居民身分」的構成條件是甚麼。
但其實有連登仔話過有可能中五都俾人抽中，所以記住向2825 4668查詢！

Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by:
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5

聽日星期五上晝一定要send出去，比管理層有下午時間回覆。

Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5

quote.msg:
首先係度多謝幫手推上個post嘅手足，感激

我係一個廢中，養妻活兒，供樓供保險，唔可以冇咗份工

見到前線啲小朋友俾人打，俾人用槍射，好心痛，好想罷工嚟幫佢地，但又驚俾人秋後算帳。

其實只要大家肯匿名用Gmail send個email俾公司管理層，問佢哋星期一全港大罷工，點樣確保員工返工嘅安全。好可能就可以迫管理層宣佈星期一全部員工唔使返公司。咁大家就可以放心去集會。

只係send一個匿名嘅email，你嘅風險成本係零，但係就可以幫到前線辦手足唔使再出嚟俾人打。

請你幫下佢哋。將下邊個email send俾公司管理層。cc 大量同事，管理層就必須回應。

聽日星期五上晝一定要send出去，比管理層有下午時間回覆。

—————————-
Subject
Please ensure the safety of our staff on 5th August Strike

Content
Dear Management and HR

According to sources as diverse as newspaper headlines (see attached link below) and various discussions on Facebook and web forums, a major strike is expected on 5th August (next Monday), with large scale assembly is also expected in our area. I am worried for both public safety and public transportation logistics for the day.

According to OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ORDINANCE, CHAPTER 509, Employers should contribute to safety and health in their workplaces by: 
* providing and maintaining safe access to and egress from the workplaces; and 
* providing and maintaining a safe and healthy work environment 

May I seek a clarification on management’s plan?

News- HK protesters call for citywide strike on August 5
https://www.asiatimes.com/2019/07/article/hk-protesters-call-for-citywide-strike-on-august-5

————-
希望可以做到
1）由你個email開始，要求管理層對罷工當日員工上班安全作出回應
2）公司自然就會主動叫唔使返工
3）就會有好多人唔使驚秋後算帳，可以出嚟集會
4）集會人數就好多
5）集會人多，之後嗰日公司都只能夠繼續叫員工繼續唔番

咁就搞成一個self fulfilling 嘅罷工，仲可以持續多日！
昨日已收到匿名電郵叫罷工。

感謝手足推post，比意見，send email 出去，同比員工星期一唔番嘅management

希望大家記住send email 出去個下嘅感覺，雖然風險好低，但明白對好多好似我咁嘅廢中來講，係要勇氣嘅

但更加希望大家記住，雨傘，魚蛋，反送中期間被捕嘅手足。自high完，繼續。

可以work from home 嘅手足，請你將你平時返工嘅鬧鐘，較早一個鐘。星期一唔係比我地訓晏啲嘅。係要出去集會*。好多公司嘅contingency plan 係要求員工如果情況許可要繼續返工。如果星期一朝早無集會，好多公司就會叫人下晝返工。

更重要係，罷工要有impact，係要比人見到，同可以持續多日。星期一集會人多，先至有壓力比管理層宣佈星期二繼續唔使返。self fulfilling 罷工，滾大個雪球。

星期一要！
1. 全世界鬧鐘校早一個鐘
2. 出去集會
3. 建議集會搞手將集會時間改做早上，如果朝早冇集會，分分鐘公司會叫員工下晝返工
4. 建議集會搞手將集會地點改喺商業區，中環，太古，觀塘，尖沙咀，金鐘，銅鑼灣。係返工地點有大型集會，管理層先至有壓力星期二繼續宣布唔使返。唔淨止一個地方，啲公司好現實，佢樓下冇集會，你係金鐘搞到幾多人佢都唔會理。
5. 前線手足忍一忍，淨係做輔助，唔好再俾人拉。你地忍一忍，先至有機會比和理非進化。

星期一罷工+集會！星期二繼續！


*留意不反對通知書，不鼓勵參與非法集會
公司收到 但公司唔覆
公司一早講定要所有人帶電腦響屋企返工
